Text:
It'd be great if people posted a link to like metacritic or gamerankings for PC games so people can get a quick idea if a game is worth downloading or not. (like they do with imdb for movies)
So here ya go: http://www.gamerankings.com/pc/671772-the-cave/index.html
Let me know if there is a better game review site to link to.
this games pretty good i played a demo on my xbox .. quick question .. i have a mac .. and if id download this torrent would i be able to play this on the mac ?
when will u upload DMC?anyway thnx alot.....

voldemort, no this wouldn't work on a mac. I don't know much about macs but i think mac programs install using a different method with files ending in .dmg, while windows programs install using an executable .exe file. I hope i got that right. 
Tpb has a seperate section for mac games. http://thepiratebay.sx/top/402
@asnsmooker DmC isn't released for PC until tomorrow... So, it'd be a good idea to check it out in the next 24 hours or so.
update just released to remove 30 fps cap please upload asap
yes...please we need the update as well...

It won't continue from my last saved game....just says Push enter over and over again...i've tried deleting the folders with the numbers in the App data->Roaming->Doublefine->The cave but nothing helps... I guess i'll must play it from the beginning...
Whenever i start the game after logo of Sega company loading screen appears and then my windows crashes.Is there any way to fix that?
is there any console version for this game? i have ps3
i must be retarded because i cant seem to find the /crack directory anywhere
The file works perfectly but the game itself is pretty meh

@riczter
Ranking means nothing. In fact most often times I end up enjoying games that get a fairly bad score. We all have different aspects of what entertains us. Just like would you rather have a clown perform at your birthday party or a famous rock band?
